text: Angel is a 1982 Irish drama movie directed by first time director Neil Jordan and starring Stephen Rea, Veronica Quilligan, Honor Heffernan, Alan Devlin, Peter Caffrey, Gerard McSorley, Ray McAnally. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 drama movies Category:Irish drama movies Category:1980s British drama movies Category:Movies directed by Neil Jordan Category:Movies set in Ireland
title: Angel (1982 Irish movie)
